TopicTitle: Cant reset vessel to start / hangar after loading save file

Articles.Content:
Hello, i've got so much problems with the save files... After i reload a save file i cant reset to start. Why?

 

For example, i burn after entering in the atmosphere or what ever, run ot of fuel.  Now i reload a savefile while i was in the mission but cant reset now. I have to reload a savefile bevor i was on the misson, and if i forgot save a whiel, i loose all the progress or my kerbal have to die.
